rules_text:
Untested Expedition can’t attack unless it has one or more counters on it.
When Untested Expedition enters or is turned face up, conjure a card named Hunt the Weak into your hand. [i](It’s a sorcery that costs {3}{G} with “Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature fights target creature you don’t control.”)[/i]
notes: !rework it’d be nice to move this art to the conjured card [DONE]
